Things start with Heybike’s Mars 2.0 750W Folding Fat Tire e-bike at $899 shipped, and the upgraded 1,000W Mars 2.0 e-bike at $999 shipped. These two models usually fetch $1,499 and $1,799 at full price, with the brand’s previous flash sale having been the first event of 2026 to drop costs down to these low prices. Now, you’re getting the continued opportunity to score $600 and/or $800 markdowns back to the lowest prices we have tracked. items.summary:
Baseus 70W Travel Adapter with Retractable USB-C Cable

Buy for $25 (Reg. $50)

Enter promo code G76S8NVM during checkout for $25.04 off.

What we love

This Baseus travel adapter has become my go-to pick and must-have in my travel kit. It supports Type C/A/G/I plug types, making it a super convenient option for charging across 200+ countries, including Europe, Asia, the US, and Australia. The built-in retractable USB-C cable is easily my favorite part, but you also get an AC socket along with 2x USB-A and a USB-C port, so you’re well covered for all your devices on the go.

items.title: Alienware’s originally $150 wireless gaming mouse with magnetic snap-on charger is down to $60 today
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Alienware’s AW720M tri-mode wireless gaming mouse in Lunar Light finish down to $59.99 shipped. Originally priced at $150, this model has been hovering around $95 in recent months. Today’s offer knocks an extra $35 off its usual rate – bringing it $10 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last year. The black variant is currently sold out, so you may want to grab this one before it disappears or the deal expires. This is the lowest price we’ve seen for this mouse since launch, and you can learn more about it below.

more…

items.title: Update: 2-pack of official Samsung 45W PD Power Adapters now down at $30 ($15 each)
items.summary:
Update: Woot is now offering a 2-pack of these official Samsung 45W PD Power Adapters down at $29.99 Prime shipped– they come in plain packaging at $15 a pop with a 1-year Samsung warranty. 

We post all sorts of great deals on notable third-party wall charger options, but if you have a penchant for first-party gear Amazon is once again offering its best price ever on the latest Samsung 45W PD Power Adapter down at $25 Prime shipped – it comes with a USB-C cable too. 

more…

items.title: Google’s latest Pixel Flex Dual 67W USB-C Fast Charger just hit its best price ever at $36 (40% off)
items.summary:
We spotted an extremely rare price drop on the latest Google Pixel Flex Dual Port 67W USB-C Fast Charger earlier this month, in fact the very first deal of any kind online. However, as of this morning, Amazon has now dropped the price even lower to deliver a new all-time low down at $36 shipped. 

more…
